english.segment2: Verse 1. Ive had some trials in this life of mine. But I never been, never been forsaken. I had troubles many, many, many times. But I thank God today my faith has never been shaken
english.segment3: (Ooo) Out of all my tears that I shed. I never seen the righteous forsaken nor his seed begging bread
english.segment4: Chorus. Determined I am gonna make it. Determined I am gonna make it. Determined I am gonna make it. Make it all the way, all the way
english.segment5: Verse 2. Now there was a woman she had a issue of blood. After spending all her money she felt that her fate was sealed. She knew if she touched the hem of his garment, that ole issue of blood, Her body would be healed
english.segment6: (Ooo) So out of everything that you go through. Dont you give up no (dont you give in) just go with Jesus Hell always be there
english.segment8: Vamp 1. Im gonna make it with Jesus (6xs)
english.segment9: Vamp2. Im gonna make it. Im gonna make it with him
english.segment10: Im gonna make it with Jesus
